title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 46.10 - Use of safety sensor devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 46.10 - Use of safety sensor devices

State Regulations

Any school bus painted national school bus chrome may be
equipped with an electronic device or devices to detect the presence of people
in the immediate vicinity of the school bus. (Authority to use a safety sensor
device or devices which causes a school bus to be overwidth is found in section
56.7
[c]
of this

Title.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
46.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
